page.title: 09A Day in the Life of? 2
page.content: 9.30a.m. We left the work on the topic and I changed to working on a pattern for the school exhibition.When I had finished working on the pattern I gave it in. 10.00a.m. I went back to my topic work and wrote about the life-cycle of a butterfly and drew a picture. 10.30a.m. In the playground I ate some breakfast out of my dinner box. 11.00a.m. End of playtime. We went back in and the class were allowed to work outside on the grass in the sunshine and the fresh air. 12.00 Dinner time. Hayley came back from violin lesson and we went out on the field to play.Lynsey,Sarah,Hayley and I fell out with Kate and she went off in a mood.
